name: Dave Zachariah
content: Dave Zachariah - Uppsala universitet Dave Zachariah Universitetslektor vid Institutionen för informationsteknologi; Systemteknik E-post: dave.zachariah@it.uu.seBesöksadress: Hus 10, Regementsvägen 10Postadress: Box 337751 05 UPPSALA Ladda ned kontaktuppgifter för Dave Zachariah vid Institutionen för informationsteknologi; Systemteknik Akademiska meriter: DocentCV: Ladda ned CV Kort presentation Associate professor at the division of Systems and Control and coordinator of the Machine Learning Arena. Research interests include: statistical machine learning & signal processing; decision theory & causal inference; localization & sensor fusion.Data-Driven Decisions and Control GroupPaper preprints available on arXivReproducible research accessible on github Publikationer Senaste publikationer Error Reduction in Leukemia Machine Learning Classification With Conformal Prediction Lysenkova, Mariya; Zachariah, Dave; Krali, Olga; Nordlund, Jessica Ingår i JCO Clinical Cancer Informatics, 2025 DOI för Error Reduction in Leukemia Machine Learning Classification With Conformal Prediction Ladda ner fulltext (pdf) av Error Reduction in Leukemia Machine Learning Classification With Conformal Prediction Safe Output Feedback Improvement with Baselines Zhang, Ruoqi; Mattsson, Per; Zachariah, Dave Ingår i 2024 IEEE 63rd Conference on Decision and Control (CDC), s. 1899-1904, 2024 DOI för Safe Output Feedback Improvement with Baselines Ladda ner fulltext (pdf) av Safe Output Feedback Improvement with Baselines Externally Valid Policy Evaluation from Randomized Trials Using Additional Observational Data Ek, Sofia; Zachariah, Dave 2024 Machine Learning Based Prediction of Imminent ICP Insults During Neurocritical Care of Traumatic Brain Injury Galos, Peter; Hult, Ludvig; Zachariah, Dave; Lewén, Anders et al.
